MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Respiration | d: Mitosis

MCQ: What allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Energy processing | b: DNA replication | c: Cell division | d: Protein synthesis

MCQ: What is the study of life at the molecular level of a cell called?
Choices: a: Ecology | b: Genetics | c: Botany | d: Anatomy

MCQ: Which type of organisms play specialized roles in the cycling of nutrients and energy in an ecosystem?
Choices: a: Protists | b: Fungi | c: Plants | d: All of the above
